sentences.sContent: When holidays came, there were Yangko and stilt shows with people eager to participate.
sentences.sContent_eng: When holidays came, there were Yangko and stilt shows with people eager to participate.
sentences.sCn: 过节时会有扭秧歌、踩高跷表演，人们也都乐意参加。

sentences.sContent: The most noteworthy features of mangrove forests, apart from their unique habitat, are: the relative paucity of the species comprising them; the arch-formed stilt roots of the Rhizophora spp.;
sentences.sContent_eng: The most noteworthy features of mangrove forests, apart from their unique habitat, are: the relative paucity of the species comprising them; the arch-formed stilt roots of the Rhizophora spp.;
sentences.sCn: 除了其独特的生境以外， 红树林最令人注意的特征是构成红树林的品种比较单一； Rhizophora 品种的拱形高跷根系；其它属的悬空根系团或呼吸根，如 Avicennia 和 Sonneratia。

words.tran: 不自然的；呆板的；僵硬的

trans.tranOther: one of two poles which you can stand on and walk high above the ground
